short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract typography details from any website and save as a CSV file

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Font Export is a must-have tool for designers, developers, and typography enthusiasts. With just a click, this Chrome extension scans the currently opened webpage and extracts detailed information about the typography used. It organizes the data into the table, providing insights into font families, sizes, styles, weights, letter spacing, and line heights. Plus, it helps export the data as a CSV file with a click of a button.
